name: Simple evolution Simulator
description:
This is only a prototype so if you have any suggestions i would be happy to hear them in the comments.

In the game you can create animals and decide their traits to se how they preform in a simulated environment where they al compete for food. Depending on how successful the animals are they will be able to produce a offspring with slightly different attributes then itself. The offspring will then exactly as the parent compete for food and so on.

This is a simple simulation of Darwin's theory
